page.title: 02TALENTED HANDS IN E.CORNWALL
page.content: This district is rich in the tradition of arts and crafts.The variety of evening classes available and instruction provided through Womens' Institutes,ensure an exceptionally high standard of work.Hobbies such as carpentry,leather-work,cabinet-making, and metal work, are also practiced commercially as are the crafts of building in stone and rag-slating.Many wives augment their income by baking items for sale through W.I.Markets. Others sell patchwork,paintings, pressed flower or applique pictures, soft toys,knitted or sewn garments, macrame and crotchet work through this outlet.Floral art shows outstanding quality and draws visitors from afar to view the Church displays or annual exhibitions.
